channel.title: Help me fix this please

i made a webclient but only i can connect i was wondering do i have to change all the 127.0.0.0 to my ip like everything not only client and the ip in gui ?
skype name: zezimaa.royal i have tv if needed

item.title: Help me fix this please
item.dc:creator: @joelandjacob joelandjacob
item.description:
@joelandjacob wrote:

[quote=“breadthat1, post:1, topic:453331”]i made a webclient but only i can connect i was wondering do i have to change all the 127.0.0.0 to my ip like everything not only client and the ip in gui ?

skype name: zezimaa.royal i have tv if needed[/quote]
Hello breadthat1,
If you’re hosting on your computer, you must portforward and connect with 127.0.0.1, whilst all other players connect with your IP Address.

redevolutionX:

wow kid srsly gtfo making rsps if uu dont know how to put a server online wow these noobs these days

Also, redevolution, fuck you. Stop flaming people, I’m sure you are shit at coding, and probally didn’t know how to do this when you started messing with servers.
